metadata.title: Elite Home Products Inc. Coastal Microfiber Print Sheet Sets, Hampton Blue, Full
features: Let your night's rest come to you naturally. With our 100% polyester sheet set, you can sleep clean and comfortable. Crafted from top-quality yarns that will provide years of lasting wear and comfort. The fabric is exceptionally durable, breathable and soft to the hand.

Twin Set includes: flat sheet 66x96x4", fitted 39x75x15", 1 pillowcase 21x31x4". Full Set includes flat 81x96x4", fitted 54x75x15", 2 pillowcases 21x31x4". Queen set includes flat, 90x104x4", fitted 60x80x15", 2 PC 21x31x4". King set includes flat sheet 108x104x4", fitted sheet 78x80x15", 2 PC 21x41x4". Cali King Includes flat 102x108x4", fitted 72x84x15", 2 PC 21x41x4".

ELITE HOME PRODUCTS is backed by incredible customer service and a 100% satisfaction . We have earned a reputation for consistent quality, innovative design and reliability that enables the company to grow and flourish in a market that has seen consistent innovation.
Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Use non chlorine bleach only. Tumble dry low, remove promptly. Iron on medium heat when needed.
description: EHP has forged a reputation for consistent quality, innovative design and reliability that enables the company to grow and flourish in a market that has seen consistent innovation.
